com.wizarpos.devices.led
Interface LEDControl

All Superinterfaces:
DeviceControl
public interface LEDControl
extends DeviceControl

LED device is an exclusive device. It can't be opened again if it's already opened.

Since:
Author:
hans

open

void open(int logicalID)
          throws DeviceException
Opens the control of the LED.

Parameters:
logicalID - logical ID of the device to open.
Throws:
DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException -
  • if the logicalID is invalid.
